title: Eager to Write (TEFC)
creator_credit: Andrew Scollo, L Reichstein F'tion, Open Channel Productions and W Buckland F'tion
brief_description: For children, the process of learning to write is a gradual and experimental one. This program follows the progress of children of different ages in the classroom. Follows a Myer Foundation program at Moonee Ponds West Primary School with Lorraine Wilson.
creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Scollo, L Reichstein F’tion, Open Channel Productions and W Buckland F’tion
